name: mona  ::  monitoring & alerting
short_description: Mona is a generic monitoring and alerting component that can monitor files and queues. API's are provided to integrate checks in your applications, including XML based alerting. Schedules are defined in XML. Alerting via mail, SMS or Jira integration.
